items.sentence: It isn\'t my place to question Tom\'s loyalty.
I told Tom that you used to live in Australia.
I told you that Tom wanted to go to Australia.
I\'ll be OK as long as I stay awake, won\'t I?
Tom jotted down the meeting time in his diary.
Tom kept me waiting for more than three hours.
We\'re currently experiencing some turbulence.
I had trouble getting out of bed this morning.
I handled the problem the only way I knew how.
Tom could see that the argument was pointless.
Tom could sing quite well when he was a child.
I don\'t speak French as well as I\'d like to.
I don\'t think Tom knows I think he\'s stupid.
Tom flexed his muscles in front of the mirror.
Tom sustained severe injuries in the accident.
Tom thanked Mary for her patience and support.
A man with a gun told Tom to get into the car.
I didn\'t want to do that as badly as Tom did.
I don\'t remember where I bought these gloves.
Tom and Mary are both in Boston, aren\'t they?
You\'re a friend of my sister\'s, aren\'t you?
You\'re lucky you don\'t have Tom\'s problems.
Tom jumped off the cliff into the river below.
Do we know anyone down there who can help Tom?
I don\'t know where I\'ll be living next year.
I don\'t think I\'d enjoy doing that with Tom.
Tom took off running when he heard the sirens.
Tom took out his notebook and started writing.
Tom tossed and turned in bed, unable to sleep.
Tom should\'ve visited Boston, but he didn\'t.
Tom will do that later when he isn\'t so busy.
Tom has already been told he needs to do that.
Tom has already been told to leave Mary alone.
Mary was wearing her favorite dress yesterday.
We weren\'t aware that we were being recorded.
We\'ll ask Tom what he thinks when we see him.
Tom will be wasting his money if he buys that.
Tom will learn how to do that sooner or later.
Tom wondered where Mary had spent the weekend.
I can\'t believe you don\'t really like pizza.
I made a lot of really good friends in Boston.
I managed to get away earlier than I expected.
I want to make sure that Tom doesn\'t do that.
I invited Tom, but I didn\'t think he\'d come.
Tom is particular about what he watches on TV.
It was an accident that was waiting to happen.
It was easy for me to convince Tom to do that.
Tom has read every book in the school library.
Tom is still expecting Mary to help him today.
I had no idea that you couldn\'t speak French.
